hitiyoth hondata hadi..dewiyoth namata wadi..."ko..kawuda kiyanne...kawuruth kiyanne naha..ara athana bas eke issaraha drayiwar sit ekata udin gahala thiyenne..ithin oowa kiyawa kiyawa yannada mawath ekkan aawe...denawa mata ratakaju tika...matti..eewa kiyawa kiyawa yanna nemeyi...ee wunata balannako ki dahak me bas ekata enawa yanawa adda..kochchara as sankhyawak dakinawa adda..hayiyo..dan meyata ganitha prashna...ganitha prashna nemeyi modiye...api ek kenek hari hariyata kalpanawen hithuwoth nodanuwathwama yahapath deyak neda apita kiyanne...ane..me onna wanda...ada nam bana mata epa....bana nemeyi pissiye..hamadama wage aadareta man mewa kiyala denne...ane oyage aadare...oyita wada kochchara dewal thiyenawada kiyawanna...aadareyi aadareyi kiya kiya his dewal waru ganan kiyawanawata wadiya oyatayi matayi dennatama watina dewal katha kalahama harima sundarayi neda...man danna sundarayak naha..man yanawa yanna...yanna nam aawe mokatada ....kawuda enna kiwuwe..ayi ithin nahayen hotu pera pera adaddi enna nokiya inna puluwanda..aththamayi man dan oyata gahanawa...gahala hari kamak naha man kiyana de ahannako ithin..pissi...pissiyanta oowa therenne naha....therenna kiyala denna man dannawa..ko ahanawako ithin..hayiyo..oya nam maha narakayi....mata epa oyawa..epama kiyayi..man danne nadda me modiwa...yanawa yanna...ow pandithaya wage yanawa yanna kiyanawa.

balayata pamini wahama athi kala aluth kramawedaya thula waradikaruwan sewimata awashyaya watapitawa sakasima saha eya ikman kirimata awashyaya pelambaawima nokarana thaththwayaka pathwana rajayata ellawana chodana pilibadawa soya balima kadinam wanneya.me mohothe siduwanneda eyaya.deshapalanayen thorawa sithana wita pawathi rajayata erehiwa abhiyogaya bharagath piris ee gana hadawathinma sathutu wanneya.namuth eeta perathuwa thibena fayil wasennata mema bara thaba eewa diga noharima khedayaki.eeta hethuwa aanduwe deshapalana nyayapathraya durwala saha udasina ekak wimaya.deshapalana meheyume sita ehi thiththa saha awalassana danna ayata ee anuwa kriyathmaka wannata nohakiya.balapam karannata nohakiya.eewa deshapalanaya dwithiyika kotagath paripalanamaya wyahuyakin wasi atha.
